name: Cloudbakers
description:
Cloudbakers is a breed of Cloud Solution Providers, known as a Cloud Services Brokerage. Businesses engage Cloudbakers to seamlessly transfer from legacy on-premise or hosted applications to best of breed SaaS. Our #1 partner is Google providing the best value in technology, Google Apps for Business!
To partner with our clients we engage with a high-service model, always a phone call away from a live human with answers to your questions. Our typical projects include messaging, collaboration, CRM, time-keeping and project management deployments.
As we understand companies have legacy applications they are married to, we perform light-weight integrations between products.
Reach out to our team and let us know your ideal Cloud environment. Cloudbakers is all about our people and our clients, we specialize in solving problems, communicating them to you, and making you look like a hero to your business.
READ MORE...
